title: First Kiss (2012)
overview: A 25 year old woman and a high school boy accidentally share a kiss on a bus. He then becomes infatuated by her even though she ignores his advances. Things hot up when her first love re-enters her life. This encourages the high school boy to try even harder to win her heart.
storyline: Wonderful screwball romantic comedy about a 25 year old women who accidentally kisses a high school boy on a city bus.
